title: Ores and metals exports (% of merchandise exports)
name: tx.val.mmtl.zs.un
readme: Ores and metals comprise the commodities in SITC sections 27 (crude fertilizer, minerals nes); 28 (metalliferous ores, scrap); and 68 (non-ferrous metals).
